amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal laws that regulate the generation, transportation, storage, or disposal of toxic, hazardous, or radioactive substances.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (numbered 130 and printed in the Congressional Record) to provide that the bill would not apply to laws or regulations that regulate the generation, transportation, storage, or disposal of toxic, hazardous, or radioactive substances.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Spratt amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 263 (Roll no. 28).
